snippet: Mamnoon Hussain, an obscure 73-year-old political figure and loyalist for Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif, was sworn in on Monday in Islamabad.
abstract: Mamnoon Hussain, Pakistan's new president, is sworn in in Islamabad; Hussain is an obscure 73-year-old political figure and loyalist of Prime Min Nawaz Sharif.
lead_paragraph: Mamnoon Hussain, an obscure 73-year-old political figure and loyalist for Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif, was sworn in on Monday in Islamabad.

headline.main: Pakistan: New President Is Sworn Into Office
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: President Is Sworn Into Office, Which Is Now a Mostly Ceremonial One
